Racial slurs, pornography interrupt S.F. school equity committee meeting

A committee that’s looking at equity issues at Lowell high school was interrupted over Zoom when “an unknown participant attacked members and attendees with racial slurs and pornographic imagery.” A similar incident happened earlier in the year during a Lowell anti-racism training.
